favicon.label: Favicon
favicon.desc: A shortcut icon usually displayed on tabs, address bars and bookmarks of most browsers.

meta.label: Header
meta.desc: Header section contains the brand logo/name and navigation links at top of the page.

background_color.label: Background color
background_color.desc: Background color for the header section.

use_logo.label: Use brand logo
use_logo.desc: Whether to show your brand logo in the header. If No, just the header title will be displayed.

logo.label: Brand logo
logo.desc: A logo to identify your company, product or service to display in the header section.

title.label: Brand name
title.desc: You can configure the title to be shown in the header section here. If logo is shown, this will not be displayed

title_color.label: Brand name text color
title_color.desc: Text color for the title, if displayed.

tile_background_image.label: Tile background image
tile_background_image.desc: If yes, the image will be tiled across the page.

line_color.label: Divider line color
line_color.desc: Color of the horizontal divider lines.

meta.label: Typography
meta.desc: Fonts for the text content in the page. If you use typekit for your fonts, ensure you configure the typekit id in Common Settings and configure the fonts here.

body.label: Body text font
body.desc: Font used for all the text content on the hosted page.

heading.label: Heading text font
heading.desc: Font used for the all the headings on the hosted page.

meta.label: Text Colors
meta.desc: Color for the texts displayed in the various body section.

text_color.label: Text color
text_color.desc: Color of the shown elsewhere in the body.

heading_text_color.label: Heading text color
heading_text_color.desc: Color of the headings elsewhere in the body.

field_label_color.label: Field label text color
field_label_color.desc: The label which are used in forms.

meta.label: Input Fields
meta.desc: All the fields used to collect input from users.

meta.label: Buttons
meta.desc: Configure the colors for the buttons and button text.

primary_background_color.label: Primary background color
primary_background_color.desc: Primary refers to the Subscribe, Update Card, Login and Update Details buttons that appear on the checkout, update card and customer portal pages.

default_background_color.label: Secondary background color
default_background_color.desc: Secondary refers to the Apply Coupon and Validate VAT number buttons that appear on the sign up page.

danger_background_color.label: Critical action background color
danger_background_color.desc: Critical button refers to canel subscription on customer portal pages.

meta.label: Section
meta.desc: Customize the look of the sections.

meta.label: Checkout Page
meta.desc: Customize the elements that are specific to your checkout page.

page_title.label: Page title
page_title.desc: Title of the hosted checkout page.

page_heading.label: Page heading
page_heading.desc: Text displayed above the order summary section.

info_title.label: Info title
info_title.desc: Title of the sidebar content on the hosted checkout page.

info_message.label: Info content
info_message.desc: Sidebar content of the hosted checkout page.

meta.label: Add/Update Card Page
meta.desc: Customize the elements that are specific to the add/update card page.

page_title.label: Page title
page_title.desc: Title of the hosted card page.

page_heading.label: Page heading
page_heading.desc: Text displayed above the existing card details section.

info_title.label: Info title
info_title.desc: Title of the sidebar content on the hosted add/updte card page.

info_message.label: Info content
info_message.desc: Sidebar content of the hosted add/update card page.

meta.label: Customer Portal
meta.desc: Customize the elements that are specific to the customer portal .

page_title.label: Page title
page_title.desc: Title of the customer portal page.

meta.label: Subscription Status
meta.desc: Customize the appearance of the susbscription status(trial, active etc.) badge shown in the customer portal.

meta.label: Customer Portal Alerts
meta.desc: Customize the appearance of the info and warning alerts containers.

content.label: Content
content.desc: Content for your footer like copyright message and year.

meta.label: IFrame
meta.desc: Styles specific for the iframe embedded checkout and card hosted pages. For API use only.

center.label: Align center?
center.desc: Specify whether to align the hosted page at center in the inside the iframe or not.

show_border.label: Show border?
show_border.desc: Whether to show border for the iframe embed hosted page.

border_color.label: Border color
border_color.desc: Border color for the iframe embed hosted page.
